Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Pressure regulator drift. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 08/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
